frontmatter.description: A quick blog post to cover the most recent features from the Tableau 2019.4 release and my playlist on YouTube.
frontmatter.title: What's new in Tableau 2019.4

frontmatter.description: In this post, I dive deep into a topic more about semantics than the feature; Viz Animations has landed in the 2020.1 beta and I'd like to make a case about why that's not the correct name for the feature we've been shown so far.
frontmatter.title: Animations vs transitions: what's the difference?

frontmatter.description: In this post I round up the new features in Tableau Desktop 2019.3 with 6 short videos covering each feature. Parameter actions, Italian localisation, local coordinate systems, explain data, parameter action enhancements and distance calculations.
frontmatter.title: What’s new in Tableau Desktop 2019.3
